Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, or extracted DNA
Purpose: To detect and report genetic variants associated with hereditary breast and gynecologic cancers to guide patient care.
Container: EDTA tube (for whole blood) or appropriate buccal swab collection container
Equipment: DNA extraction system, PCR thermal cycler, Next-Generation Sequencing platform, real-time PCR system, centrifuges and pipettes
